channel.title: #103 Refactored + Community Gathering
channel.description:
Heres a renamed rsclient that can connect to rs and a server on port 40000+worldId, or change the parameter in Launcher map.put("10", "1"); to map.put("10", "0"); [IMG]http://puu.sh/mi4q0/a0d94d512b.jpg[/img]
Link: [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?n5omn9xndl161xi]https://www.mediafire.com/?n5omn9xndl161xi[/url]
Dumped: ObjectDefinition NpcDefinition Model Animation NodeContainer Node Timers Friend FriendList Isaac Renamed: Stream reading/writing more...
Login response: [code] bldr.putByte(loginResponse); bldr.putByte(0); //authenticator boolean bldr.putInt(0); //authenticator code regardless of boolean is skipped
bldr.putByte(player.getRights()); bldr.putByte(0); bldr.putShort(player.getIndex()); //player index bldr.putByte(0); //ironman setting 1 regular 2 ult [/code]
Post a base as a suggestion you as a community would like to see with 103, will not do apollo. I have probably over half packets handled already.
Credits: James Flamable

item.title: #103 Refactored + Community Gathering
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:3, topic:554285”][quote author=zeneric link=topic=673210.msg4501961#msg4501961 date=1452218421]
Thanks, absolutely great release. Very useful.

For those attempting to use this, I’ve gotten most of the login protocol complete and the update protocol 100% done. If op wants to share packets I’ll post mine.
[/quote]
please post them! would be helpful[/quote]
yes please.

Read full topic

item.title: #103 Refactored + Community Gathering
item.dc:creator: @Anadyr Anadyr
item.description:
@Anadyr wrote:

Heres a renamed rsclient that can connect to rs and a server on port 40000+worldId, or change the parameter in Launcher map.put(“10”, “1”); to map.put(“10”, “0”);

Link: https://www.mediafire.com/?n5omn9xndl161xi

Dumped:
ObjectDefinition
NpcDefinition
Model
Animation
NodeContainer
Node
Timers
Friend
FriendList
Isaac
Renamed: Stream reading/writing
more…

Login response:

        bldr.putByte(loginResponse);
        bldr.putByte(0); //authenticator boolean
        bldr.putInt(0); //authenticator code regardless of boolean is skipped
        
        bldr.putByte(player.getRights());
        bldr.putByte(0);
        bldr.putShort(player.getIndex()); //player index
        bldr.putByte(0); //ironman setting 1 regular 2 ult

Post a base as a suggestion you as a community would like to see with 103, will not do apollo.
I have probably over half packets handled already.

Credits:
James
Flamable

Read full topic
